statements: UPDATE GenomicSequences SET species_name='Human', sequence='ATCGATCG', sequence_source='Laboratory' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE GenomicSequences SET sequence_source='Natural', species_name='Mouse', sequence='TAGCTAGC' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE GenomicSequences SET species_name = 'Human', sequence_source = 'NCBI' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE GenomicSequences SET sequence = 'ACGTACGTACGT', species_name = 'Mouse' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE Sequence SET sequence_name = 'Updated_Seq_1' WHERE sequence_id = 1;
UPDATE Relationship SET relationship_type = 'New Relationship' WHERE relationship_id = 2;
UPDATE Sequence SET sequence_name = 'New Sequence Name' WHERE sequence_id = 1;
UPDATE Relationship SET relationship_type = 'New Relationship Type' WHERE sequence1_id = 2 AND sequence2_id = 3;
UPDATE Sequence SET sequence_data = 'ATCG' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE EvolutionaryRelationships SET relationship_type = 'Homologous' WHERE sequence1_id = 1 AND sequence2_id = 2;
UPDATE Sequence SET sequence_name = 'DNA', sequence_data = 'ATCG' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ComparisonResults SET similarity_score = 0.75 WHERE comparison_id = 5;
UPDATE gene_sequences SET sequence = 'ATGCATGC' WHERE sequence_id = 1;
UPDATE species SET average_evolution_distance = 0.75, species_name = 'Human' WHERE species_id = 101;

UPDATE species SET average_evolution_distance = 0.75 WHERE species_name = 'Human';
